question: Which among the following is correct about Bhaddasala?
option1: He was a poet in the court of Chandragupta Maurya
option2: He was the general of the Nanda Army
option3: He was an ambassador of Ceylon King sent to Asoka’s court
option4: He was a playwright in the Gupta Era
answer: He was the general of the Nanda Army
explanation: Bhaddasala – (Bhadra shala / Bhadra shal ) was very strong opponent faced by chandragupta. He was a general of King Nanda.
